extensionShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the extension's name.

extensionDescription.message: Amabanga arabizi, umutekano Adblock kuri YouTube ™. Guhagarika Amatangazo kuri YouTube.com.

timesaveInfo.message: Guhagarika Youtube ™ yazigamye hafi. $ yazigamye Igihe $ cyubuzima bwawe.
timesaveInfo.description: Tells the user how many time he saved already.

displayVideoBranding.message: Erekana amakuru yagutse munsi ya videwo

displayActionCountAsBadgeText.message: Erekana ibyifuzo byahagaritswe kubara muri badge
